metadata.title: CVE-2020-13304 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was discovered in GitLab versions before 13.1.10, 13.2.8and 13.3.4. Same 2 factor Authentication secret code was generated whichresulted an attacker to maintain access under certain conditions.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
